name: Witchy Woes
description:
When a power hungry, egotistical young witch disobeys her school’s headmasters, she is cast out and exiled. Play as Devious Donna as she wreaks havoc on those who have wronged her. Harness the dark arts and exact your revenge on the masters of magic.

Witchy Woes is a top-down shooter with a blend of magic & mayhem. Play as Devious Donna, an exiled witch, who seeks revenge on the headmasters of her coven. Harness the power of Dark Magic and begin your reign of terror by destroying those who stand in your way.


Harness the powers of magic and unlock new weapons to continue your reign of terror!

Explore the darkest corners in the world of magic.

Sneak past enemies as you traverse through the witch’s territory, bypass the guards and unleash mayhem!

Destroy those who stand in your way!

Defeat each of the headmasters as you exact your revenge!

Rapid Ryan’s Arcade: Experience a collection of bonus games including Peg Solitaire, Carrot Sweeper & more!
